casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Darrell SCOTT, Defendant-Petitioner. C-284 September Term 2017
079489 Supreme Court of New Jersey. November 14, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-002045-13 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
